languages.text: {n}Что-то неуловимо меняется в Маражае — словно по его лицу проносится тень.{/n} "Нет. Никто не смеет поминать владыку Комморры без серьезной причины. Развлечь тебя — точно такой причиной не является".

{n}A subtle shift occurs on Marazhai's face, as if a shadow has just fallen across it.{/n} "No. No one speaks of the overlord of Commorragh without good reason. Amusing you is certainly not reason enough."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то неуловимо меняется в Маражае — словно по его лицу проносится тень.{/n} "Нет. Никто не смеет поминать владыку Комморры без серьезной причины. Развлечь тебя — точно такой причиной не является".

traits.locale_text: {n}A subtle shift occurs on Marazhai's face, as if a shadow has just fallen across it.{/n} "No. No one speaks of the overlord of Commorragh without good reason. Amusing you is certainly not reason enough."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La cara de Marazhai cambia ligeramente, como si una sombra la hubiera cubierto.{/n} «No. Nadie habla del señor supremo de Commorragh sin buen motivo. Divertirte no es razón suficiente».
languages.original_text: {n}A subtle shift occurs on Marazhai's face, as if a shadow has just fallen across it.{/n} "No. No one speaks of the overlord of Commorragh without good reason. Amusing you is certainly not reason enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}La cara de Marazhai cambia ligeramente, como si una sombra la hubiera cubierto.{/n} «No. Nadie habla del señor supremo de Commorragh sin buen motivo. Divertirte no es razón suficiente».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋脸上的表情发生了微妙的变化，仿佛突然落下一道阴影。{/n}“不行，若要提及科摩罗的霸主，必须有很好的理由才行。满足你的好奇心显然不算在内。”
languages.original_text: {n}A subtle shift occurs on Marazhai's face, as if a shadow has just fallen across it.{/n} "No. No one speaks of the overlord of Commorragh without good reason. Amusing you is certainly not reason enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋脸上的表情发生了微妙的变化，仿佛突然落下一道阴影。{/n}“不行，若要提及科摩罗的霸主，必须有很好的理由才行。满足你的好奇心显然不算在内。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}まるで影でも落ちたかのように、マラズハイの顔に微妙な変化が生じる。{/n}「いや、正当な理由なしにコモラフのオーヴァーロードについて話す者などいない。お前を喜ばせるというのは、その理由にはならん」
languages.original_text: {n}A subtle shift occurs on Marazhai's face, as if a shadow has just fallen across it.{/n} "No. No one speaks of the overlord of Commorragh without good reason. Amusing you is certainly not reason enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}まるで影でも落ちたかのように、マラズハイの顔に微妙な変化が生じる。{/n}「いや、正当な理由なしにコモラフのオーヴァーロードについて話す者などいない。お前を喜ばせるというのは、その理由にはならん」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un changement subtil s'opère dans l'expression de Marazhai, comme si une ombre venait de s'abattre sur ses traits.{/n} « Non. Personne n'évoque le souverain de Commorragh sans une bonne raison. Et votre curiosité mal placée n'est certes pas un motif suffisant. »
languages.original_text: {n}A subtle shift occurs on Marazhai's face, as if a shadow has just fallen across it.{/n} "No. No one speaks of the overlord of Commorragh without good reason. Amusing you is certainly not reason enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un changement subtil s'opère dans l'expression de Marazhai, comme si une ombre venait de s'abattre sur ses traits.{/n} « Non. Personne n'évoque le souverain de Commorragh sans une bonne raison. Et votre curiosité mal placée n'est certes pas un motif suffisant. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Miene verändert sich kaum merklich, als habe sich ein leichter Schatten auf sie gelegt.{/n} "Nein. Niemand spricht ohne guten Grund vom Herrscher von Commorragh. Euch zu amüsieren ist gewiss nicht Grund genug."
languages.original_text: {n}A subtle shift occurs on Marazhai's face, as if a shadow has just fallen across it.{/n} "No. No one speaks of the overlord of Commorragh without good reason. Amusing you is certainly not reason enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Miene verändert sich kaum merklich, als habe sich ein leichter Schatten auf sie gelegt.{/n} "Nein. Niemand spricht ohne guten Grund vom Herrscher von Commorragh. Euch zu amüsieren ist gewiss nicht Grund genug."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}A subtle shift occurs on Marazhai's face, as if a shadow has just fallen across it.{/n} "No. No one speaks of the overlord of Commorragh without good reason. Amusing you is certainly not reason enough."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüz ifadesi, sanki üzerine bir gölge düşmüş gibi hafiften değişiyor.{/n} "Hayır. Commorragh'ın efendisinin adı sebepsiz yere anılmaz. Senin istemen de geçerli bir sebep sayılmaz."
languages.original_text: {n}A subtle shift occurs on Marazhai's face, as if a shadow has just fallen across it.{/n} "No. No one speaks of the overlord of Commorragh without good reason. Amusing you is certainly not reason enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüz ifadesi hafiften değişiyor, sanki üzerine bir gölge düşmüş gibi.{/n} "Hayır. Commorragh'ın efendisinin adı sebepsiz yere anılmaz. Senin istemen de geçerli bir sebep sayılmaz."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
